items.question: How does an expertise work?
items.answer: The expertise follows our 6-step methodology: card identification, authentication, condition evaluation, rarity analysis, market analysis, and value determination. You receive a complete report at the end of the process.

items.question: How many cards can I have appraised?
items.answer: We offer individual expertise for a precious card as well as complete inventories for collections of several hundred cards. The rate is adapted to the volume.

items.question: Will my insurance accept your expertise?
items.answer: Yes, our reports are designed to be accepted by insurance companies. They contain all necessary information: precise identification, documented condition, and justified replacement value.

items.question: Which TCGs do you appraise?
items.answer: We cover the main collectible card games: Pokémon, One Piece, Dragon Ball, Magic: The Gathering, and Disney Lorcana.

items.question: How much does an expertise cost?
items.answer: The rate depends on the type of service (individual card, collection, urgency) and volume. Contact us for a free personalized quote.

items.question: Do I need to send my cards?
items.answer: Depending on the type of expertise, we can travel or ask you to send your cards securely. The terms are defined when establishing the quote.

items.question: What is the difference between expertise and grading?
items.answer: Grading (PSA, BGS) certifies the condition and authenticity of a card in a sealed case. Our expertise provides a complete analysis with market value, ideal for insurance, succession or sale, without physical modification of the card.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: CARTATTAC was born from a simple observation: the collectible card market has exploded, but there was no independent player capable of providing reliable and documented expertise.

Passionate collectors since childhood, we have seen the market evolve, prices soar, and with them the risks: increasingly sophisticated counterfeits, difficulties insuring collections, complications during successions...

Faced with these challenges, we decided to put our expertise at everyone's service: collectors wishing to protect their assets, insurers needing reliable valuations, notaries managing successions, or auction houses seeking professional estimates.
Our strength? Total independence. We do not buy or sell cards, which guarantees the objectivity of our valuations. Our only interest is to provide you with rigorous and documented expertise.
